text: Young and Dangerous is a 1957 American drama movie. It was directed by William F. Claxton. Actors include Lili Gentle, Mark Damon, Edward Binns, Frances Mercer, and Connie Stevens. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * Category:1957 drama movies Category:1950s American drama movies Category:Movies directed by William F. Claxton
title: Young and Dangerous (1957 movie)
